name: MyCalc
0:
”Alexa, Open my calculator”
”What's five plus five”
”Add 3 to the answer”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my calculator
des:
This is simple Calculator app for Alexa devices. As of now it can help Alexa perform additions, subtraction, division and multiplications
After each operation Alexa remembers last calculation so that you can perform next calculations on that.

To perform Addition - What's fifty two plus three; Add two to the answer.
To perform Subtraction - What is fifty two minus three; Subtract two from the answer.
To perform Multiplication - What is fifty two multiplied by three; Multiply two by the answer.
To perform Division - What's fifty two divided by two; Divide the answer by two.

In next update:
Log calculations
Percentage calculations
Power and root calculations
Basic maths formulas for trigonometry
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
